profile: 'IN THE END, SERVICE WINS!' High Quality Wrought Iron & Stained Glass Door Inserts - Toronto GTA Area. A door says a lot about a home and at What A Pane, we want to make sure that the first impression your guests have of your home is a lasting one. We are one of the few door insert companies in the GTA that have an actual business premises and a fully stocked showroom. We help to add sophistication, personality and eye-catching details to your home’s front door. From stained glass to wrought iron work, What A Pane offers the best value in the GTA. Our family operated business, established in 1998, is known for providing quality, reliable services and competitive prices. With our design experts, What A Pane continues to the number one choice for beautiful door inserts that Toronto residents love to display in their home. We offer a variety of patterns, textures and designs, so you will have plenty of choice when choosing which door glass suits your home the best. Call or email us now - we answer promptly! Whatsapp, email, text hotline 416 436-8208 We collect and store used decorative glass and donate to Habitat For Humanity. :-) We're social here: https://www.pinterest.ca/whatapanedesign/what-a-pane-door-inserts/ https://www.facebook.com/whatapanedesign/ hyyps://www,pinterest.com/whatapanedesign/
service_area:
Whole of GTA and central Ontario.
From Niagara to Barrie to Peterborough.
For all areas Call TOLL FREE 1-888 401-PANE(7263)
hours: 10-4:30, Closed Wed & Sun. 12-6pm Thursday. Call if you need a later app
products:
Wrought Iron and Decorative door inserts and window inserts.
Interior blinds (Blinds between glass)

profile:
Centennial Windows & Doors is a family owned and operated business that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors. We sell, manufacture, install, and service our own complete line of award winning, energy efficient windows and doors.
 
Why homeowners choose Centennial Windows & Doors
 
The Best Warranty
- We provide a 100% warranty on everything we do for as long as you own your home – NO fine print and NO exclusions. And if you sell your home, it's transferable to new homeowners within 10 years of purchasing Centennial windows and doors.
 
Responsibility and Accountability
- We take full responsibility to manufacture, install, and service your windows and doors. You are dealing with ONE company only and one phone number. 
 
Proven Installation Quality
- We DO NOT hire subcontractors. All work is performed by our full time, uniformed employees, fully covered under Workers’ Compensation. Centennial Installers were the first in Canada to write the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) Fenestration Installation Technician (FIT) certification exam.
 
Leaders in Energy Efficiency
- Centennial Windows & Doors was the first window company in Canada to be ENERGY STAR® certified. We have been awarded the:
          - 2004 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award
          - 2005 – ENERGY STAR Retailer of the Year Award
          - 2008 – ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence Award
          - 2014 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award – Windows and Doors
- Since 2013, our windows have been recognized as ENERGY STAR Most Efficient.
service_area: We have 13 branch areas across Ontario: Barrie, Brantford, Burlington, Chatham, Kitchener, Listowel, London, Mississauga, Sarnia, Orangeville, Owen Sound, Windsor, Oshawa and every town in between.
products: Custom residential windows and doors. Replacement vinyl windows. Premium steel and fibreglass entry door systems. Vinyl sliding patio doors. 25 standard window colours. 29 standard door colours. 4 door stains. 4 interior window coatings.
services: In-home sales directly to homeowners without the use of subcontractors. Custom window manufacturing. Custom door manufacturing. Replacement window installation. Replacement door installation. Retrofit installation. Full frame tear-out installation. Custom colour matching. In-house, expert Customer Service Technicians.
specialities: Custom window manufacturing. Custom door manufacturing. Replacement window installation. Replacement door installation. In-home sales directly to homeowners without the use of subcontractors. In-house, expert Customer Service Technicians.
payment_method: Cheque, Visa, Mastercard, Financing available with approved credit
memberships: CSA, ENERGY STAR, Fenestration Canada, IGMAC, NFRC, SAWDAC, Home Builders’ Association, BBBs

profile:
Euro Choice Windows & Doors was founded in 1998. Our company specializes in the manufacturing and installation of European style and design windows and doors, energy efficient UPVC vinyl windows, sliding doors, steel entrance doors and fibreglass doors. All Euro Choice Windows & Doors products are built to strict specifications and are regularly inspected for operation and craftsmanship. All our staff is professional and courteous with many years of experience. Since we do not use sub-contractors we have a reputation for consistency and quality. This reputation took nearly 20 years to build and we are proud to see our windows and doors in your home. 

Services: Windows Installation & Insulation
Doors Installation & Insulation

profile:
Everest Windows & Doors is a full-service Window & Door production, sales, and installation company. We service the following areas: Toronto, Newmarket, Aurora,  Richmond Hill, Hamilton, Vaughan, Mississauga, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Curtice, Brampton, Stoney Creek, Caledon, Orangeville, Milton, Burlington, Oakville, Guelph, Cambridge, Kitchener, Waterloo, St. Catherine, Niagara Falls, Barrie, Innisfil, Orillia, Collingwood, Wasaga Beach, Muskoka

***

Our motto is “CUSTOMER FOR LIFE”. Choosing our products and services means that you will never have to replace your windows and doors again for as long as you own your home.
We design, manufacture, and deliver better-performing windows and doors with precision and speed while providing our customers with peace of mind and an overall pleasant experience.
Our experienced team and our new manufacturing plant offer architects, contractors, and developers exciting new possibilities in window performance and design.

profile: Masterbuild windows and doors established in 1999 in toronto  . We provide professional instalation services on windows and doors replacement all across  GTA   .  Which includes building bay windows ,  brick  and concrete cut outs ,   aluminum glass enclosures , European tilt and turn windows , comertial windows and doors , garage doors , interior doors. multiple windows styles and glass options , triple glass with LowE glass and argon gas , foam field vinyl windows frames and more . All types and styles  of exterior doors  from steel and fiberglass doors to a solid wood doors with any style of stained glass designs  or wrought iron Disign finished any colour , with  any type of trim  and with hundreds of hardware choices to choose from   . Our locally  manufactured windows and doors all comes with highest energy ratings in canada . And all been tested for wind , water , heat , cold and pressure by energy star  . All of our windows and doors are installed by our in house friendly licensed insured and certified installers  with minimum of 15 years experience in a trade and compliments by a life time warranty  , one of the best warranties on the market  today . We provide a free no obligation in home professional  consultations or a tour at our showroom  . We have thousands of Successfully completed projects across ontario in the last over 20 years with thousands of  satisfied home owners . Call  us now to get best results , guaranteed energy savings and a pleasant windows and doors replacement experience .

profile:
EXPERIENCED TEAM:
Working on the market for over 12 years, anywhere in the GTA and Simcoe County. Post-installation services available as necessary.

WE BUILD WITH LOVE:
We install windows and doors with a lifetime manufacturer warranty, and we also offer a 10 year warranty for our job.

FAST AND EFFICIENT:
Contact us for customer references to hear about the quality of our service first-hand. We service the greater Toronto area including Kitchener, Mississauga, Barrie, etc.  Window Force Home Improvements is the leading installer and distributor of high-performance, energy-star certified windows and doors of all kinds.

profile:
The #1 windows and doors in the Toronto Area.
You’re looking for replacement windows that aren’t just beautiful and practical but are packed with innovative technology for maximum energy efficiency. 
This is your one-stop solution to beautiful windows and doors, professional installation, and responsive service at an exceptional price.

The Waysee Difference
Simple, FAST, and a worry-free experience backed by one of the best warranties in the area.

Trained Professionals.
Rigorously trained and selected to be effective, fast and polite during installation.

Wide Selection.
Browse our massive catalogue of windows and doors. Variety that satiates any home enthusiast.

Thorough Quality Control.
Our products are thoroughly quality tested before they’re ready for installation.

25 Year Warranty.
Have an issue? Let us know and we’ll make it right. Our goal is to build trust with our customers that lasts a lifetime.

Fast and Responsive Customer Care
We respond to inquiries as fast as possible. Usually within minutes, sometimes seconds.

No Middleman.
No hidden fees and no delays. At Waysee, you get factory-priced windows and doors.
